Like HeartVine said, but to give you the step by step:

The login for the support page and the website (boards) are separate. 
https://i.imgur.com/IrSBuzi.png?noredirect

There are currently issues with the login transition preventing players from easily logging into support. There are two current workarounds:

1. Open the support page in an incognito/private window and follow the process as normal, pressing the login button when prompted.

2. Log out of the website **from the support page**, and then follow the process as normal, pressing login when prompted.

If your support page has the blank "OC" login in the top right, you're good to go. If it only has your summoner icon with "OCEANIA" it means the support page is seeing you as logged in on the website and not in support. You need to follow one of the steps above.

That's a known issue with the support site. You need to make sure you're logged out via the support site, then log in again and it should work (you'll need to re-log to the boards afterwards, though).
Try a different browser - I've had issues in the past logging in with my main browser but worked fine from a different one.
Your name says it all.
of course. thanks for your input.
How many times have u been punished before now?
i had a 14 day ban for a similar outburst then this that is all.

If you skipped the two chat restrictions that likely means language like hate speech or suicide encouragement ("kys" and the like) was involved. In your 14 day reform card, there is a very explicit warning that continued violation of the ToS (which verbal abuse qualifies as) would result in a permanent suspension of your account.

i never once said anything even LIKE that. i have only ever talked about in game performance. i have not recieved any "reform card" i have checked and i will challenge some rioter to show where i said anything that is hate speech or "suicide encouragement"

Upon logging into the client you would have seen something like this:

https://i.imgur.com/U4XhEGo.png

Much as you would now for the permanent suspension, below which would have been your chat logs.

As for hate speech and the like, it is only speculation. Only very serious offences result in skipping punishment tiers, so either you have received chat restrictions and missed the screen filling "CHAT RESTRICTED" popup and the subsequent effects in game, or you committed an offence serious enough to warrant skipping those two tiers, which typically involves things like hate speech.

As for "what verbal abuse?", your entire log is tearing into your team. You don't have to swear or use any specific words to abuse someone. It's not about any one "noob" or "ur bad", it's about the log as a whole.
also what verbal abuse? saying noob? "ur bad" wtf this is verbal abuse now?

I hope this clarifies your concern - if you have any other questions let us know.

Teotonic
